definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: This is an action movie. It was all about fighting and killing.
sentences.chinese: 这是一部动作片，是关于打打杀杀的。

sentences.english: Fighting is not my style. I'm a well-educated man.
sentences.chinese: 打打杀杀你找别人吧，我是受过高等教育的。

sentences.english: I'm a combat soldier. That's all these jokers understand.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道打打杀杀，那些小丑只会这么想。

sentences.english: It was all about fight and kill.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片都是关于打打杀杀的。

definition: to carry out a vendetta against sb
to kill to the last one (idiom)/to exterminate/to eradicate/ruthless
to break the law and commit crimes (idiom); malefactor/evildoer/to perpetrate outrages
to start a feud/to become enemies
to pick a quarrel/to start a fight
